author: Ken Kaneki (Tokyo Ghoul)
text: Why is it that the beautiful things are entwined more deeply with death than with life?

author: Ken Kaneki (Tokyo Ghoul)
text: Human relationships are chemical reactions. If you have a reaction then you can never return back to your previous state of being.

author: Ken Kaneki (Tokyo Ghoul)
text: You're wrong. It's not the world that's messed up; it's those of us in it.

author: Ken Kaneki (Tokyo Ghoul)
text: It's better to be hurt than to hurt others. Nice people can be happy with just that.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this world.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: Power is not will. It is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: Pain will make the world grow up. Pain will force people to think.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: We are but men, drawn to act in the name of revenge that we deem to be justice.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: Justice comes from vengeance, but that justice only breeds more vengeance.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: Love is not necessary, power is the only true necessity.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: It’s not the face that makes someone a monster; it’s the choices they make with their lives.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: Religion, ideology, resources, land, spite, love, or just because… No matter how pathetic the reason, it’s enough to start a war.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: People cannot show each other their true feelings. Fear, suspicion, and resentment never subside.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: Do you understand pain a little now? If you don’t share someone’s pain, you can never understand them.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: In this world, wherever there is light – there are also shadows. As long as the concept of winners exists, there must also be losers.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: Those who do not understand true pain can never understand true peace.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: The longer you live, the more you realize that reality is just made of pain, suffering, and emptiness.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: You think you’re the only ones who matter. You think you can just escape. That peace will suddenly fall upon you from the sky.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: People’s lives don’t end when they die, it ends when they lose faith.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: Feel pain. Contemplate pain. Accept pain. Know pain.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: The concept of hope is nothing more than giving up. A word that holds no true meaning.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain. Because life’s greatest lessons are learned through pain.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: You are merely a momentary life, a temporary existence of coalesced energy, energy that once was a single, ultimate form.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: How can you say that you'll never change? That’s why you’ll always lose.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: Humans are nothing but divided entities always seeking conflict.

author: Pain (Nagato) (Naruto)
text: War brings pain and injury and death to both sides. The world of shinobi is ruled by hatred.
Your stupidity is quite entertaining.
author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)

text: This planet has three minutes left. Enjoy them.
author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)

text: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.
author: Goku (Dragon Ball Z)

text: Sometimes life is too uncertain to have regrets.
author: Goku (Dragon Ball Z)

text: It's not an overstatement to say that the fate of the universe is within my hands.
author: Vegeta (Dragon Ball Z)

text: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something in return.
author: Future Trunks (Dragon Ball Z)

text: I do not fear this new challenge. Rather like a true warrior, I will rise to meet it.
author: Vegeta (Dragon Ball Z)

text: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.
author: Goku (Dragon Ball Z)

text: It’s not the face that makes someone a monster; it’s the choices they make with their lives.
author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)

text: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something in return.
author: Future Trunks (Dragon Ball Z)

text: Hard work is worthless for those that don’t believe in themselves.
author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)

text: You can’t sit around envying other people’s worlds. You have to go out and change your own.
author: Shanks (One Piece)

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius (Referenced in One Piece)

text: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weaknesses are. And once you know your weaknesses, you can become stronger and kinder.
author: Gildarts Clive (Fairy Tail)

text: Power isn’t determined by your size, but by the size of your heart and dreams!
author: Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)

text: A person grows up when he has to. When he ceases to whine and starts doing things on his own.
author: Jiraiya (Naruto)

text: It's not an overstatement to say that the fate of the universe is within my hands.
author: Vegeta (Dragon Ball Z)

text: A real sin is something you can never atone for.
author: Uchiha Itachi (Naruto)

text: Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal, but it has already left a scar.
author: Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)

text: It's not the power that makes the person, but the will to fight for what’s right.
author: Gohan (Dragon Ball Z)

text: A person becomes strong when he has something he wants to protect.
author: Haku (Naruto)

text: You should enjoy the little detours. Because sometimes, those detours take you to the best places.
author: Ging Freecss (Hunter x Hunter)

text: I refuse to let my fear control me anymore.
author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)

text: I am the hope of the universe. I am the answer to all living things that cry out for peace.
author: Goku (Dragon Ball Z)

text: Dying is not repaying a debt! That is not what he saved you for. Only by continuing to live can you repay him for what he did.
author: Roronoa Zoro (One Piece)

text: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.
author: Goku (Dragon Ball Z)

text: Hard work is worthless for those that don’t believe in themselves.
author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)

text: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something in return.
author: Future Trunks (Dragon Ball Z)

text: A person becomes strong when he has something he wants to protect.
author: Haku (Naruto)

text: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weaknesses are. And once you know your weaknesses, you can become stronger and kinder.
author: Gildarts Clive (Fairy Tail)

text: Power isn’t determined by your size, but by the size of your heart and dreams!
author: Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)

text: Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal, but it has already left a scar.
author: Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)

text: A person grows up when he has to. When he ceases to whine and starts doing things on his own.
author: Jiraiya (Naruto)

text: Dying is not repaying a debt! That is not what he saved you for. Only by continuing to live can you repay him for what he did.
author: Roronoa Zoro (One Piece)

text: It’s not the power that makes the person, but the will to fight for what’s right.
author: Gohan (Dragon Ball Z)

text: A real sin is something you can never atone for.
author: Uchiha Itachi (Naruto)

text: A lesson learned without pain is meaningless. That’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something in return.
author: Edward Elric (Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood)

text: A lesson learned without experiencing the pain is just a memory.
author: Ichigo Kurosaki (Bleach)

text: In this world, there are very few people who actually trust each other.
author: Aizen Sosuke (Bleach)

text: It's not the face that makes someone a monster; it’s the choices they make with their lives.
author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)

text: Power is not will. It is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.
author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)

text: You should enjoy the little detours. Because sometimes, those detours take you to the best places.
author: Ging Freecss (Hunter x Hunter)

text: No one knows what the future holds. That’s why its potential is infinite.
author: Rukia Kuchiki (Bleach)

text: To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can’t go back to happiness you could have.
author: Matsumoto Rangiku (Bleach)

text: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
author: Brook (One Piece)

text: You have to accept the fact that you’re not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.
author: Roronoa Zoro (One Piece)

text: A person’s worth isn’t determined by their bloodline. It’s determined by what they do.
author: Kakashi Hatake (Naruto)

text: A lesson learned without experiencing the pain is just a memory.
author: Ichigo Kurosaki (Bleach)

text: You should enjoy the little detours. Because sometimes, those detours take you to the best places.
author: Ging Freecss (Hunter x Hunter)

text: The world isn’t perfect. But it’s there for us trying the best it can… That’s what makes it so damn beautiful.
author: Roy Mustang (Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood)

text: It's not the power that makes the person, but the will to fight for what’s right.
author: Gohan (Dragon Ball Z)

text: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something in return.
author: Future Trunks (Dragon Ball Z)

text: It's not an overstatement to say that the fate of the universe is within my hands.
author: Vegeta (Dragon Ball Z)

text: A person grows up when he has to. When he ceases to whine and starts doing things on his own.
author: Jiraiya (Naruto)

text: To surpass monsters, you must be willing to abandon your humanity.
author: Armin Arlert (Attack on Titan)

text: A hero isn’t someone who is never afraid. A hero is someone who conquers that fear.
author: All Might (My Hero Academia)

text: Power is not will. It is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.
author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)

text: Whether a fish lives in a clear stream or a dirty pond, the fish remains the same. The environment doesn’t change the essence of the fish.
author: Shiba Kaien (Bleach)

text: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future!
author: Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)
Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Your demise was decided the moment you opposed me.

author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Only the weak rely on hope. The strong create their own destiny.

author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Power is the only true justice in this universe.

author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Weakness disgusts me. Strength is absolute.

author: Cell (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Survival of the fittest isn’t a choice, it’s a necessity.

author: Cell (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Fear is the catalyst of power.

author: Cell (Dragon Ball Z)
text: The weak die, the strong survive. That is the law of nature.

author: Majin Buu (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Happiness is a lie for the weak. Strength is the only truth.

author: Broly (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Power without control is nothing but destruction.

author: Broly (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Rage is my fuel, and power is my weapon.

author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Mercy is for the foolish. Domination is for the strong.

author: Vegeta (Dragon Ball Z)
text: A warrior’s pride is his most valuable weapon.

author: Vegeta (Dragon Ball Z)
text: I will ascend beyond all limits, no matter the cost.

author: Goku Black (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Justice is an illusion of the weak. Strength is the only law.

author: Goku Black (Dragon Ball Z)
text: To rise, one must first destroy. That is the path to perfection.

author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Fear me, for I am your inevitable doom.

author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)
text: All existence bows before true power.

author: Cell (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Evolution is reserved for those willing to claim it.

author: Cell (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Perfection is not given. It is taken.

author: Majin Buu (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Fear feeds power, and I am the ultimate nightmare.

author: Broly (Dragon Ball Z)
text: The strongest will always rise, and the weak will perish.

author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)
text: I am the embodiment of power. Kneel or be erased.

author: Vegeta (Dragon Ball Z)
text: If you are not striving to be the best, you are already defeated.

author: Goku Black (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Pain and suffering breed strength. That is the way of gods.

author: Zamasu (Dragon Ball Z)
text: The flawed must be purged to create true perfection.

author: Zamasu (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Only divinity deserves to rule. Mortals are but insects.

author: Cooler (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Conquest is not a choice, it is my birthright.

author: Cooler (Dragon Ball Z)
text: A king’s will is absolute. Power bends to my command.

author: Roronoa Zoro (One Piece)
text: When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back.

author: Roronoa Zoro (One Piece)
text: If I die here, then I'm a man that could only make it this far.

author: Roronoa Zoro (One Piece)
text: Scars on the back are a swordsman's shame.

author: Goku (Dragon Ball)
text: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire.

author: Goku (Dragon Ball)
text: I’d rather be a brainless monkey than a heartless monster.

author: Goku (Dragon Ball)
text: Even a low-class warrior can surpass an elite, with enough hard work.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this world.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: Power is not will. It is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.

author: Madara Uchiha (Naruto)
text: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.

author: Ichigo Kurosaki (Bleach)
text: The difference in ability… what about it? Do you think I should give up just because you’re stronger than me?

author: Ichigo Kurosaki (Bleach)
text: Unless I grip the sword, I cannot protect you. While gripping the sword, I cannot embrace you.

author: Aizen Sosuke (Bleach)
text: Fear is necessary for evolution. The fear that one could be destroyed at any moment.

author: Eren Yeager (Attack on Titan)
text: If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don’t fight, you can’t win!

author: Eren Yeager (Attack on Titan)
text: Once I’m dead, I won’t even be able to remember you. So I’ll win no matter what. I’ll live no matter what!

author: Mikasa Ackerman (Attack on Titan)
text: The world is cruel. But it’s also beautiful.

author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)
text: Hard work is worthless for those that don’t believe in themselves.

author: Jiraiya (Naruto)
text: The true measure of a shinobi is not how he lives but how he dies.

author: Kakashi Hatake (Naruto)
text: A person grows up when he has to.

author: Levi Ackerman (Attack on Titan)
text: No one knows what the outcome will be. So choose whatever you’ll regret the least.

author: Armin Arlert (Attack on Titan)
text: A person who cannot sacrifice everything cannot change anything.

author: Aizen Sosuke (Bleach)
text: There is no such thing as ‘truth’ or ‘lies’ in this world. There never has been.

author: Rukia Kuchiki (Bleach)
text: We are all searching for someone whose demons play well with ours.

author: Erwin Smith (Attack on Titan)
text: There is no greater disgrace than dying a coward.

author: Itachi Uchiha (Naruto)
text: A lesson without pain is meaningless.

author: Renji Abarai (Bleach)
text: I do not fear death. I fear dying without leaving a mark.

author: Commander Erwin Smith (Attack on Titan)
text: The future belongs to those who push forward.

author: Zeke Yeager (Attack on Titan)
text: We do what we have to, even if it means becoming monsters.

author: Jean Kirstein (Attack on Titan)
text: You’re not a soldier. You’re not a warrior. You’re just a kid who got dragged into this.

author: Kenpachi Zaraki (Bleach)
text: You wanted revenge? You’re just making excuses.

author: Kenpachi Zaraki (Bleach)
text: A battle is not won by one’s sword, but by the heart and determination behind it.

author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Power is not something given. It is something to be taken.

author: Frieza (Dragon Ball Z)
text: The universe is mine to rule and there is no one who can stand in my way.

author: Cell (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.

author: Cell (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Only the weak fear failure. The strong embrace it and grow stronger.

author: Majin Buu (Dragon Ball Z)
text: Destruction is a form of creation. And I am its artist.
